post.title: gta iv: the lost the damned (debut trailer)
post.content: so this is the 1st downloadable content for gta iv that xbox 360 owners were braggin' about having before ps3 owners?? bwahahaha. http://www.rockstargames.com/thelost...ed/index2.html xbox 360 execs must be wondering: "and we paid rockstar how much for this exclusive content???"
